title: So, the Blitzcrank Arcade game got me thinking...
body:
This could be a great opportunity for lore actually. You know, imagine it if Riot would bring out an retro looking game, but one that has a story and deals with some aspect of the lore? And it's not like that would consume too many resources, after all we are talking about simple game concepts here. 

Also, then Riot Games would be more... living up to their name instead of being "Riot Game".

But what kind of small games could they bring out? And with what lore connected to it?

Well, I thought of some ideas, but as always they are not perfect or anything, just random stuff that came to my mind. These games can have a light hearted touch, but I would almost prefer them to be filled with more serious writing... Also, I'm not really expecting like 40+ hours of gameplay from these small things. A few (if even that) would be enough, as it's suppsed to be only an addition to LoL.

Idea One: A game featuring Riven. Now now, ya all calm down, no need for Riven hate in here! Move that to the balance boards. You guys surely remember the old Legend of Zelda games on the SNES. Protagonist with a sword on a journey? Well, I wonder what kind of character that might apply to...

Idea Two: Lucian's lore. Would be perfect for a 2-player coop game, a sidescroll jump&shoot game set on the Shadow Isles. You can play either Senna or Lucian. Well, we all know how this ends, but until then you can shoot up some ghuls and mini-bosses, and maybe gather some information about this weird place that is the isles... Sounds pretty awesome to me.

Well, these are my ideas so far... what do you guys think of it? Or what ideas do you have for something like this? Just post it all here ^^

Edit: Oh got a new Idea: "Super Noxus Bros", featuring Draven and Darius... No idea how to get lore done on this, but it sounds awesome enough for me xD

I still think an RTS in the style of Warcraft would be right up their alley. They could even reuse animations and models from League.

That would be a huge project, though.

Let's say they're making an RTS game based on Frelijord event, and you can play as either Ashe's tribe (Avarosa), Sejuani's tribe (Winter's Claws) or Lissandra. Now we won't need to work on the lore much because it's already been done. Some retouching would be nice to make it fit into an RTS genre.

Now, they need to make models and animations for workers, buildings, and a whole bunch of combat units. Then we need to balance those out. Then they'll need to make maps for each level. In Warcraft 3, each of the four races got their own campaign (not counting the expansion), and had about 7~8 levels each, disregarding cutscenes. The expansion added basically the same amount of work for the new campaigns.


I think the minigames are okay. Maybe they can make a side scrolling RTS like "Age of War" or "Epic War" series (both flash games) where players just spawn units in one lane to push, and make it a bit lore-heavy since the gameplay will be a bit bland.

Well, I was mostly thinking about Metroid Fusion when writing this (my personal all time favourite of GBA games)...You could even make an entire series of that, each one featuring another Shadow Isles champ. These games do not have to be long, after all Metroid Fusion could be speedruned in less than 2 hours, the usual time for when you first play it is something like 8-10 hours if I remember correctly. Short, but extremly awesome - that's the kind of game I'd like to see Riot make!

Super Noxus Bros could happen if a Noxus/Demacia event happens.
instead of goomba stomps for Darius it could be dunks.

But really the lore I want to see more of is Shurima, with Azir waking up and seeing what his world has become and what he does in this new strange world. Just a thought.

Azir could be fitting for a  building-strategy game like the ANNO series (ya know, rebuild shurima and stuff) - but that would kinda go way above the level of "a small and nice minigame"... Another thing could be some kind of RPG where Azir wanders around the desert, fighting threats to his empire off with his sandsoldiers, trying to adapt to the "modern" world while also trying to recruit the modern shuriman tribes to come back with him to the city he just ressurected... Could be nice turn-based combat, featuring multiple characters (Nasus, Sivir; Azir on one side, Rene, Cass and Xerath on the other, Rek'sai somewhere in between.)

You could even make some void-lore happen in this as icathia was part of the shurima desert too ... Azir might know something about that...

I was more thinking along the lines of a 2D adventure/side-scroller as he finds the decimation of his people. Maybe add some soft, sad music and no voices and you could get some vibe of how Azir feels. Alone, forgotten. And the part of his lore where he rebuilds the destruction of his city in sand could be fitting for this sadder tone, with maybe no sound at all.
I would rate 10/10 if Riot did this and play it for hours.
